page.html:
Have you ever been in the situation where you need to deviler or change applications fast and you struggle because of complex architectures, lack of documentation or just because the previous contractor is gone?

I like to dig into IT systems and I’m really enthusiast to help you building your next application or bring it up to the next level.

I always try to find the most progmatic and efficent solutions to have business needs fulfilled. I’ve successfully implemented full stack solution with Java, PL/SQL and Angular.

I like to build boring solutions with minimal dependencies and no fancy but who stick as close as possible to the standard of the industry like plain Java, Spring boot, HTML, CSS, SQL… with this idea Learn once, never migrate

Want to work with me? Please contact me via linkedin
